participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly, enjoys socializing and trying new things. Has a competitive side, particularly in sports.
participant_1.background: my favourite artist is travis scott. my mother is a dentist. i'm currently looking for a job preferably at a restaurant. i like playing basketball. i have one older sister.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and approachable, loves to meet new people. Balances work and school with a laid-back attitude.
participant_2.background: i have blonde hair and blue eyes. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i work at a bar at night to pay for college. i do not like chicken.

content.text: It's not a surprise to watch the video.
I am very sorry, but I can not speak russian
